name: Space Confetti
description:
Space Confetti

Created by moonunit (Edward Kiddle)

Contributions by Tim Kroschel

Made for the Bullet Hell? Jam

Fly your space ship through space, avoiding enemy's confetti-like bullets.

Your allocated colour will change automatically, you can absorb bullets of the same colours as you, this will give you ammo. Fire your laser at enemies once you have ammo to kill them.

Use your mouse to move and left click to shoot.
